alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Claiborne; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 1:45AM CDT until June 16 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Western Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... North central Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 145 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Plain Dealing to near Eastwood, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Minden, Homer, Arcadia, Haynesville, Cotton Valley, Sarepta, Dixie Inn, Shongaloo, Evergreen, Athens, Alden Bridge, Rocky Mount, Leton, Linton, Holly Springs, Bellevue, Aycock, Spring Lake, Gilark and Ivan. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
